item.title: PAT OATES IS GAY
item.description: Jim Sharky from the Lone Shark Podcast at www.comedyisdead.com for a discussion on many things including our frustrations with people like Pat Oates, Stavros from CUMTOWN and Chris C Snacks Clarke ! Jim is a character for sure ! We have a bonus 20 minute episode being released to www.patreon.com/scumtown where he tells an awesome never before heard DAVE MOON story ! This is a Connecticut Open Mic PODCAST SPECIAL. --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: RIP RIDE PODCAST's own SKINNYVINNY666
item.description: Skinny Vinny stops by after a LONG awaited visit to the sCumtown podcast to talk the Bam Margera, Steve -O incident that I went through all of 2019, how he has always appreciated my comedic value, his MTV days and also his battle with heroin addiction! I REALLY ENJOYED THIS ONE go follow him on instagram @skinnyvinny666 and follow me while your ass is at it @vinnybeedle  --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: Keith Coogan from Disney's Fox and the Hound
item.description:
Keith Coogan (Hollywood Actor) who you may have seen in movies like "Don't tell Mom the babysitter's dead", "Toy Soilders", and Disney's Fox and the Hound skypes in with Scumbag Vinny during this crazy pandemic all the way from Los Angeles, California to discuss the movies above mentioned as well as his father who was Hollywood's first child star and played uncle fester later in life as well as Keith himself getting the guts to get in the Jay and Silent Bob REBOOT... ROBIN WILLIAMS is mentioned !!! Kick ass episode enjoy


Donate to my patreon for bonus content www.patreon.com/scumtown 

--- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: Scumbag Steve PATREON sneak peak and BONUS EPISODE (2 for 1)
item.description: My best friend in like Scumbag Steve joins us to talk about how many bongs his dad broke of his even tho he is 30 years old he still lives at home. That is a sneak preview of a patreon episode which usually I am charging for but in context it makes sense to listen to that first as a sneak peak and then check out part 2 which is about Steve getting revenge on his father and running into a glass table that his dad made with an SUV! Steve is going to be a regular on this show, do not mind his constant attempts at doing something illegal his brain cells are not all there!  www.patreon.com/scumtown to support the podcast!!  @vinnybeedle on instagram  @scumbagvinny on TIK TOK 58,000 followers and counting !! you can also see the video of Steve hitting his dads table on either of those places!  Thanks for listening I hope you enjoy boy episodes in one with my boy Steve  --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: Kill Tony Podcast's Very Own Illustrator RYAN J. EBELT
item.description: Ryan J. Ebelt joins the podcast during quarantine to talk about my favorite podcast KILL TONY. We meet for the first time and he tells me how hard he practiced to become as good of an artist as he is. He does all the art and promo for the podcast which is heard by hundreds of thousands of people all over the world. We talked about my experience hanging out with Tony Hinchcliffe and Jeremiah Watkins in CT at the Casino and how down to earth their entire crew is and what it is like to hang out at the World Famous Comedy Store in Los Angeles, California every week and meet the worlds best comedians. He showed me and talked about art he did for WEEMAN and BILL BURR... This guys amazing... go follow him on instagram @ryanjebelt and go to www.ryanjebelt.com for the Kill Tony prints and more inquiries on personal art work. --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: FCUK Stavros Halkias of BUMTOWN
item.description:
Comedian Kevin Doty joins me to discuss a ton of awesome topics but the one thing that comes up that I can not let go is being mentioned on the premium episode of Cumtown this week. I don't mind when the boys make fun of me all together but usually its NICK OR ADAM... Stavros coming at my jugular speaks to his character of not supporting other FAT BALD COMEDIANS WHO GET LAID which is a real movement. Just cause he is fatter and more disgusting than I am does not mean he can talk down to me. Fuck that Fat piece of shit ! 

--- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: HALL OF FAMERS
item.description:
Artie Lange says "Vinny Beedle is a GOOD MAN" Big Ian Cunningham has gained over 15 million views with his parody songs, he hosts court audio on WPLR FM radio in New Haven, CT and has been an entertainer and comedian for a long time in the state of CT and he talks about a ton of stuff with Scumbag Vinny in this episode ... go on TIK TOK or instagram and follow @BIGIANC he is a funny as dude and deserves all his success! HE ALSO WON A HUGE COMEDY CONTEST at Los Mariachis and wants you all to know that. Battle of the COMICS CHAMP IAN CUNNINGBRESHHUUUUT ... also we shit on alot of people including Connecticut's Hall of Fame Comedy Lineup

--- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: IN ANDRE WE DO NOT TRUST
item.description:
CLOSE FRIEND OF THE SHOW AND CO HOST OF THE IN GODFREY WE TRUST PODCAST JUMPS ON TO TALK TO 60,000 PEOPLE ABOUT HOW HE DOESNT KNOW ME, HE BULLIED ME FOR PAY... AND WELL THAT THERE IS AN ISRAEL TYPE MAFIA TRYING TO KILL ME. IN THIS EPISODE WE WILL REFLECT ON WHAT IT IS LIKE TO BE A SCUMBAG BUT ALSO DIVE IN MINDHUNTER STYLE ON THE DEPTHS IT TAKES TO BECOME A CLOSET SCUMBAG. 


DISCLAIMER: NO ASAINS WERE HURT DURING THE MAKING OF THIS PODCAST, ANDRE KIM JR AND I ARE NO LONGER FRIENDS BUT IF YOU DO NOT SEE A PUBLIC APOLOGY COMING FROM HIM SOON VIA VIDEO FORM THERE WILL BE MORE TO COME. KEEP YOUR FRIENDS CLOSE AND YOUR ENEMIES CLOSER IS SOMETHING I JUST CANT LIVE BY ANYMORE. @ANDRETHECOMEDIAN IS A VERY FUNNY DUDE, WITH ALL THE TALENT AND NETWORK IN THE WORLD TO MAKE IT... BUT YOU DONT BITE THE HAND THAT FEEDS YOU!!!

--- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support

item.title: SCUMTOWN: Episode 1 - The Vinny Beedle Show
item.description:
SCUMTOWN: Episode 1 - The Vinny Beedle Show

Co Host Rodney Norman who has spent over 20 years in the comedy business discusses how awful Scumbag Vinny really is, and they discuss dealings they've had together. SBV gives an update on Bam Margera... talks some shit to some other podcast hosts, and they talk about various other things including Jeffrey Epstein, Popeyes Chicken Sandwiches & Bringer shows. 

--- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/scumtown/support
